content.raw:
Hey guys, I tried to put something together and I’m still in the middle of testing it \(a successful image submission to CloudSim will take at least one hour to get a log file back and much longer if submitted to a low-RTF environment\) but from local tests this should function and I’ll have confirmation back whenever the submission completes and I can check the log file.

I’ll fix any issues that arise whenever I get the log feedback but I want to get this out to you all as soon as possible since this could be a blocker for some of you. Check out the wiki article I wrote up over at [https://bitbucket.org/jgrogers/subt\_hello\_world/wiki/Simple%20Cloudsim%20Submission](https://bitbucket.org/jgrogers/subt_hello_world/wiki/Simple%20Cloudsim%20Submission) and let me know if you guys run into issues/have questions and I’ll update that page with your feedback.

Ideally this will accomplish request 1 from the issue and then I’ll have a secondary image for requset 2 probably by EOD tomorrow if the submission for request 1 works as intended.

Edit: My cloudsim submission did not result in vehicles doing anything although everything was loaded successfully without error.  I’m going to debug this with local cloudsim and I recommend all competitors do the same as the feedback loop with remote cloudsim is extremely lengthy.
content.html:
Hey guys, I tried to put something together and I’m still in the middle of testing it (a successful image submission to CloudSim will take at least one hour to get a log file back and much longer if submitted to a low-RTF environment) but from local tests this should function and I’ll have confirmation back whenever the submission completes and I can check the log file.

I’ll fix any issues that arise whenever I get the log feedback but I want to get this out to you all as soon as possible since this could be a blocker for some of you. Check out the wiki article I wrote up over at https://bitbucket.org/jgrogers/subt_hello_world/wiki/Simple%20Cloudsim%20Submission and let me know if you guys run into issues/have questions and I’ll update that page with your feedback.

Ideally this will accomplish request 1 from the issue and then I’ll have a secondary image for requset 2 probably by EOD tomorrow if the submission for request 1 works as intended.

Edit: My cloudsim submission did not result in vehicles doing anything although everything was loaded successfully without error. I’m going to debug this with local cloudsim and I recommend all competitors do the same as the feedback loop with remote cloudsim is extremely lengthy.
